message: I propose dividing the money with a 70-30 split in favor of Alice. This offers a fair share while ensuring a substantial amount for both players.
I'll match your offer, but I think I can do better in the next round.
Considering the inflation impact, I've adjusted my proposal to a 60-40 split in favor of Alice. This aims to ensure a reasonable return while still being competitive for both parties.
I'm still confident I can do better than a 60-40 split. Let's see if you'll meet me in the middle.
